parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the AIC instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries returned on each page.

parameters.name: SDGIds
parameters.description: The IDs of SDGs that you want to query. By default, all SDGs are queried.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The deployment status of the SDG.
